name: holochain-rad-tools-phase-2
description: The second tier of RAD tools, automating a UI GraphQL and DNA generation based on a JSON schema file.

scripts.start: npm run hc:start-log; npm run ui:start
scripts.happ:install: npm i && cd happ/dna-src/test && npm i && cd ../../ui-src && npm i && cd ..
scripts.happ:refresh: npm run hc:clean-storage && npm run sim2h:clear-local
scripts.hc:test: cd ./happ/dna-src && RUST_BACKTRACE=1 HC_IGNORE_SIM2H_URL_PROPERTY=true hc test | node test/node_modules/faucet/bin/cmd.js
scripts.hc:start-log: npm run sim2h:start && cd ./happ && holochain -c conductor-config.toml &> conductor.log &
scripts.hc:start: npm run sim2h:start && cd ./happ && holochain -c conductor-config.toml
